page.title: 13HEALTH CARE AT NEWLANDS
page.content:
IN OUR FIRST YEAR AT SCHOOL A DOCTOR COMES TO EXAMINE US AND EVERY NOW AND AGAIN, 2 NURSES COME TO CHECK OUR HAIR AND FEET AND HANDS. WE ALSO HAVE VISITS FROM A DENTIST, AN OPTICIAN AND A PERSON TO CHECK OUR HEARING. WE SOMETIMES GET KITS FOR TEETH CARE FROM THE DENTIST, CONTAINING PILLS, A TOOTHBRUSH AND TOOTHPASTE. THE PILLS TEST HOW WELL WE BRUSH OUR TEETH. IN THE BORDERS, THERE IS A HEALTH & FITNESS VAN WHICH COMES ROUND TO SEE HOW FIT WE ARE AND TO TEACH US ABOUT HEALTH AND FITNESS. WE DO ALL SORTS OF EXERCISES AND TESTS. IT IS GOOD FUN.
IN AN EMERGENCY, CHILDREN CAN BE TRANSPORTED QUITE QUICKLY TO THE NEAREST HEALTH CENTRE WHICH IS IN WEST LINTON AND HAS A STAFF OF 3 DOCTORS AND 3 DISTRICT NURSES.
